issue.title: [Python][Doc] Update pandas doc
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-10094](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10094). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
https://arrow.apache.org/docs/python/pandas.html has a bunch of TODOs, references to outdated versions, and rst markup errors. According to https://github.com/apache/arrow/blame/master/docs/source/python/pandas.rst, most of the file hasn't been touched in years.

comments.body:
